sentences.english: The vine still clings to the moldering wall.
sentences.chinese: 藤蘿依舊纏繞坍塌的牆垣。

sentences.english: The righteous walls are opening in our educational systems.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的教育系統中，將展開公義的牆垣。

sentences.english: And he shall set engines of war against thy walls, and with his axes he shall break down thy towers.
sentences.chinese: 他必安設撞城錘攻破你的牆垣，用鐵器拆毀你的城樓。

sentences.english: With salvation's walls surrounded, Thou mayst smile at all thy foes.
sentences.chinese: 救恩牆垣四圍環繞，儘可嗤笑衆仇敵。

sentences.english: Like a city whose walls are broken down is a man who lacks self control .
sentences.chinese: 人不伏制自己的心，好像毀壞的城邑，沒有牆垣。

sentences.english: But the children of Israel walked upon dry land in the midst of the sea； and the waters were a wall unto them on their right hand， and on their left.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人卻在海中走乾地，水在他們的左右作了牆垣。

definition: door/the opening panel of a door
Linqing county level city in Liaocheng 聊城[Liao2 cheng2], Shandong
all black, no daylight (idiom); a world without justice
area above the lintel of a doorway
Great stone bridge or Dashiqiao county level city in Yingkou 營口|营口, Liaoning
